needle: The secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza mentioned in the document are figs, prosciutto, and goat cheese

model_response.text: When working for a big company, the ideal size of the group is roughly 8. This allows for freedom and individual initiative, as a smaller group has more members, each with the freedom to work together as a single unit, whereas a large group has fewer members, with each member reliant on others for guidance. However, companies know this, so they use technology to divide the work into smaller units, making it possible to coordinate and optimize the work.
